title: Ticket #2814: condor_submit shouldn't warn about dag_status, failed_count unused
description: DAGMan now passes dag_status and failed_count to condor_submit for every DAG node (because of the final node implementation) and condor_submit complains if they're not used. Condor_submit shouldn't complain if they're not used, because that's almost always the case...
check_ins: 2012-Mar-28 11:52   Check-in [31015]: Gittrac #2814: fixed this, and documented the fix in the version history (condor_submit now specifically excludes dag_status and failed_count from its warnings for unused macros). (By Kent Wenger )
creator: wenger
